tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dna_access_controls (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  dna_data VARCHAR(255),
  authorized_personnel VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE dna_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  dna_sequence TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE access_controls (
  user_id INT,
  access_level TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES dna_data(id)
)
